image.caption: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives

profileText: A Representative from Ohio; born in Elyria, Lorain County, Ohio, September 18, 1984; graduated from Saint Ignatius High School, Cleveland, Ohio, 2003; attended The Ohio State University, Columbus, Ohio, 2003-2007; M.B.A., Stanford University, Stanford, Calif., 2014; professional athlete; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Sixteenth and to the succeeding Congress (January 3, 2019-January 3, 2023); was not a candidate for reelection to the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress in 2022.
